Columns.Description: Type of agent the data was collected from. This will be 'Containers'
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Image ID of the container image
Columns.Name: ImageID

Columns.Description: Size of the container image [amount of data (on disk) that is used for the writable layer]
Columns.Name: ImageSize

Columns.Description: Virtual Size of the Container Image [Total amount of disk-space used for the read-only image data]
Columns.Name: VirtualSize

Columns.Description: Count of containers with this image that are in running state
Columns.Name: Running

Columns.Description: Count of containers with this image that are in stopped state
Columns.Name: Stopped

Columns.Description: Count of containers with this image that are in failed state
Columns.Name: Failed

Columns.Description: Count of containers with this image that are in paused state
Columns.Name: Paused

Columns.Description: Count of containers with this ContainerImage
Columns.Name: TotalContainer

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
